title: Behind the Scenes Minis: Derby Fury and Complex Lucy
itunes:title: Behind the Scenes Minis: Derby Fury and Complex Lucy
description:
Holly and Tracy talk about the angry-making aspects of the Millar will's aftermath, and discuss the only Black participants in the derby. They also discuss the intriguing life of Lucy Parsons, including her very complicated identity and behaviors.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
